trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer lyd inndata som er tilknyttet en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En tale gjenkjenner genererer informasjon om lyd inndataene som en del av recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til gjenkjent lydklippet, bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Fører recognition kan produseres ved følgende hendelser og metoder for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasser:-hendelser:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>-metoder:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>> [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition resultatet fra Emulerte talegjenkjenning ikke inneholder gjenkjent lyd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Slik recognition resultatet, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>returnerer `null` og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>metoden oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om Emulerte talegjenkjenning den `EmulateRecognize` og `EmulateRecognizeAsync` metoder for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Henter plasseringen i lyd inndataflyten for starten på gjenkjent lyden.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen refererer til plasseringen på begynnelsen av gjenkjent uttrykket i inndataene enhetens genererte lyd dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligning av `RecognizerAudioPosition` -egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>klasser referere til den gjenkjenner posisjonen i inndataene lyd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Disse posisjonen kan være forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av tale Recognition hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>egenskapen henter systemtiden ved starten av recognition-operasjonen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen i lyd inndataflyten for starten av gjenkjent lyden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Henter hvor lenge lyd inndataflyten for gjenkjent lyden.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Varighet i lyd inndataflyten gjenkjent lyden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Henter formatet for lyd behandlet av en recognition-motor.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Formatet for lyd behandlet tale kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Velger og returnerer en del av gjeldende gjenkjent lyd som binære data.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Startpunktet for lyd dataene som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på segmentet som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en avsnittet om gjenkjent lyd, som angitt av audioPosition og duration .

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPositionog duration definerer segmentet lyd utenfor området for det gjeldende segmentet.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende gjenkjent lyd inneholder ikke data.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter systemtiden ved starten av recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen starttid henter systemtiden ved starten av recognition operasjonen som kan være nyttig for ventetid og ytelse beregninger.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen henter plassering i den angitte enheten genererte lyd dataflyten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Systemtid ved starten av recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Skriver hele lyden til en dataflyt som Rå data.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Lyd data skrives til `outputStream` i binær form.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Ingen overskriftsinformasjon er inkludert.

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Metoden WriteToAudioStream bruker Wave-format, men inneholder ikke Wave-hodet.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil inkludere overskriften Wave, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som skal motta lyd data.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Skriver lyd til en dataflyt i Wave-format.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Lyd data skrives til `outputStream` som inneholder en ressurs interchange format (RIFF) filhodet i Wave format.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>metoden bruker samme binært format, men inneholder ikke overskriften Wave.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som skal motta lyd data.
